Let marketing teams build their pages

Thanks to a pre-built list of UI sections, marketers can design exactly the pages they want.

View the list of UI sections

Leave your developers alone

You can publish, edit and delete pages without help from developers. Your technical team can finally focus on their tasks.

View how to create a page

Preview your changes

Thanks to an integrated Preview Mode, you can visualize your pages before publishing them.

Fully responsive

This starter works well on all screens, whether it's mobile, tablet or desktop.

Easy to customize

We use Tailwind for styling. You can change your site's theme without digging through the code.
